explains: adj. 匈牙利的；匈牙利语的
n. 匈牙利人；匈牙利语

sentences.en: You might think Hungarian a pushover to learn. It is not.
sentences.cn: 你可能以为匈牙利语容易学。事实并非如此。

sentences.en: Accusations of harbouring suspects were raised against the former Hungarian leadership.
sentences.cn: 匈牙利前领导人被指控窝藏疑犯。

sentences.en: Béla Bartók was a Hungarian, whose life stretched from the late nineteenth century to the middle of twentieth century.
sentences.cn: 贝拉·巴托克是匈牙利人，他的一生从19世纪末延续到20世纪中叶。
